body_html: Can you elaborate on how to use a single executor thread and a single eigen thread? I tracked down the error and the deepest failure point i can find is "impl_.reset(new ThreadPool::Impl(env, thread_options, "tf_" + name, num_threads, low_latency_hint));"

body: Can you elaborate on how to use a single executor thread and a single eigen thread? I tracked down the error and the deepest failure point i can find is "impl_.reset(new ThreadPool::Impl(env, thread_options, "tf_" + name, num_threads, low_latency_hint));"
